Sentencas: A new monolithic solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) design stacked with flatten tubes of unit cells without using metallic interconnector plate is introduced and evaluated in this study.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: The anode support is manufactured in a flat tubular shape with fuel channel inside and air gas channel on the cathode surface.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: This design allows all-ceramic stack to provide flow channels and electrical connection between unit cells without needing metal plates.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: This structure not only greatly reduces the production cost of SOFC stack, but also fundamentally avoids chromium poisoning originated from a metal plate, thereby improving stack stability.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: The fuel channel was created in the extrusion process by using the outlet shape of mold.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: The air channel was created by grinding the surface of pre-sintered support.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: The anode functional layer and electrolyte were dip-coated on the support.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: The cathode layer and ceramic interconnector were then spray coated.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: The maximum power density and total resistance of unit cell with an active area of 30 cm(2) at 800 degrees C were 498 mW/cm(2) and 0.67 Omega cm(2), respectively.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: A 5-cell stack was assembled with ceramic components only without metal plates.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels

Sentencas: Its maximum power output at 750 degrees C was 46 W with degradation rate of 0.69%/kh during severe operation condition for more than 1000 h, proving that such all ceramic stack is a strong candidate as novel SOFC stack design.
Titulo: Monolithic flat tubular types of solid oxide fuel cells with integrated electrode and gas channels
